mapper.select: select sum(watermeter_usage) as daily_use, FROM_UNIXTIME(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as dateline, 0 as meter_type from t_watermeter_usage where watermeter_no = #{meterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo} group by FROM_UNIXTIME(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into t_watermeter_usage( watermeter_no, watermeter_usage, end_time, end_value, enprNo ) values ( #{watermeterNo}, #{watermeterUsaga}, #{endTime}, #{endValue}, #{enprNo} )
